items.ja: Vinicius Jr 'didn't want to offend' in Clasico clash
items.en: Vinicius Jr 'didn't want to offend' in Clasico clash
items.text_for_match: Vinicius Jr 'didn't want to offend' in Clasico clash Real Madrid's Vinicius Jr says he "didn't want to offend anyone" when he and some of his team-mates clashed with Barcelona players after winning Sunday's El Clasico. Real Madrid's Vinicius Jr says he "didn't want to offend anyone" when he and some of his team-mates clashed with Barcelona players after winning Sunday's El Clasico.

items.ja: Stole a penguin, jailed in Singapore, now Aberdeen sporting director
items.en: Stole a penguin, jailed in Singapore, now Aberdeen sporting director
items.text_for_match: Stole a penguin, jailed in Singapore, now Aberdeen sporting director Lutz Pfannenstiel has stolen a penguin, spent 101 days in jail accused of match-fixing, modelled for Armani - and is Aberdeen's new sporting director.
